Love this shirt, it’s so flattering, bought more in different colors. So soft and good quality.

My bad! I just assumed that the sizing would be the same for all of Suuksess tops, but not in this case. I bought my usual XS which has fit me great. 评论概述: Make sure you check the size chart
评论详情: Amazon recommended an XL, which is usually my size in most brands. I should have checked the size chart, because for this brand an extra large runs extremely small compared to an objective scale. The shirt is a nice quality and color. I wish I could size up, but "XL" is the biggest size they carry. Always sad when brands fail to be inclusive. You'd think they'd at least care from a business perspective. 7/10 people in the US are a size 14 or above. Excluding fat people means excluding like 70% of the sales pool in a huuuge country. How can you hate fat people more than you love money?

It’s so soft and stretchy but not stretchy to were if you are a little bigger and decide to get a small anyways it won’t stretch that much you have to be a small for the small. The layers are thick and it isn’t see through at all

I absolutely love this SUUKSESS tank top and long sleeve shirt combo! The fabric is so soft and breathable, yet sturdy enough to hold its shape after several washes. The double lining in the tank top adds a touch of luxury and ensures there's no see-through issue, making it perfect for casual or semi-dressy occasions.

评论概述: SUUKSESS Women Double Lined V-Neck Crop Tank Top
评论详情: Another hit from SUUKSESS! This crop tank is so flattering with the double-lined fabric that feels high-quality and supportive. The V-neck is the perfect depth—not too low but still super cute. It’s great for layering under a jacket or wearing on its own. The fit is snug and true to size, and as always, SUUKSESS delivers amazing basics I can’t get enough of!

I size down to XS for a fitted look. It’s soft and comfortable. Great basic to layer with. Overall it’s super flattering and I love that it’s double lined. It’s not see through.

this shirt is so cute and comfy. i love how i could work out in this or just wear it to school. its stretchy but also so soft at the same time. i would definitely recommend.
I love this brand! I own several pieces from their line. Only 4 stars because it’s a little see through far as the nips go. But I’m 5’3 120/125 pounds & i got a size small in all colors.

This is a great basic top, perfect for cooler weather. I love that it is double lined, it really makes everything extra smooth and clean looking. I went with my usual size and I’d say the fit is spot on. Exactly what bag I wanted, highly recommend!

This is the most flattering shirt I have ever put on my body. The cut isn’t too deep and works great for a bigger chest. Double lined and gives you that hourglass shape. This top has clean stitching and fits well. It looks just like the ad page photo. It has a bit of a sheen to it. The color is a classy tone. I'm quite happy with this order.

Love love love this top!! has deece compression with the double lined aspect. thumbs up thumbs up!

评论概述: Runs true to size maybe a bit small
评论详情: I usually get an XS in this type of fabric and it was tight on me. There is some stretch but I def won’t need to wear a bra with this since it’s super compressed. I personally don’t have an issue with the compression but someone else might. I would get a small next time in this brand. If you’re familiar with mango pop the fabric is like those double lined basics they have which I freaking love. This is a good basic shirt and it’s not see through but material is still thin so wear pasties on those colder days
